## packet storage update-snapshot-policy

Update a snapshot policy

### Synopsis


Update a snapshot policy

```
packet storage update-snapshot-policy
```

```

      --frequency string   Snapshot frequency (default "15min")
      --policy-id string   Snapshot policy ID
```
